longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Visitors can obtain a visa on arrival at Minsk (MSQ) if
   
Additional Information:
- All visitors are required to have health insurance which can
  be purchased on arrival in Minsk (MSQ)
